title: Hour 1 - Hall of Fame Game, Updates on Deshaun Watson Appeal
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Hall of Fame Game, Updates on Deshaun Watson Appeal
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, Dan recaps the Hall of Fame Game between the Jaguars and the Raiders. Dan discusses NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell choosing New Jersey Attorney General Peter C. Harvey to preside over NFL’s appeal of Deshaun Watson’s six-game suspension. Plus, Dan and the Danettes revisit their NFL hot takes from 2021 and preview new hot takes for 2022!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
